virtual void iprop::CPropertiesManager::InsertProperty ( iser::IObject *  objectPtr,
const QByteArray &  propertyId,
const QByteArray &  propertyDescription,
int  propertyFlags,
bool  releaseFlag 
)
virtual

Insert an property into the object.

Parameters
objectPtrProperty data object.
propertyIdUnique ID of the property in the properties repository.
propertyDescriptionHuman readable description of the property.
propertyFlagsProperty flags.
See Also
IProperty::PropertyFlags.
Parameters
releaseFlagIndicate who control the property's memory. If releaseFlag is true, the control over the objectPtr will be overtaken by this object.

Implements iprop::IPropertiesManager.

bool iprop::CPropertiesManager::RemoveProperty ( const QByteArray &  propertyId,
bool  onlyOwned = true 
)
protected

Remove property from manager.

Parameters
propertyIdID of property to remove.
onlyOwnedif true, only properties owned by manager can be removed. Property is owned by manager if it was inserted with set releaseFlag.
Returns
true, if property could be removed.
virtual void iprop::CPropertiesManager::ResetProperties ( )
virtual

Reset properties.

The method set all static properties to their default values and removes all dynamically added properties from the manager.

Implements iprop::IPropertiesManager.
